title: Band, 16th century
medium:
Medium: linen, silk
Technique: embroidery, drawnwork
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt
description: Strip of insertion in a design of scrolling angular oak branches with foliage and acorns in reserve on the linen ground. Background of drawn work embroidered with red silk.
